meanings.definition: A type of flavonoid compound found in plants.
meanings.sent1: The flavanone in the flower gives it a bright color.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study flavanone to learn more about plant compounds.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the flavanone-rich petals.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a rainbow of colors, with each flower containing a different flavanone.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the flavanone was as sweet as honey.

meanings.definition: Any of various derivatives of flavanone.
meanings.sent1: The new supplement contains a unique flavanone for better health.
meanings.sent2: Chefs use different types of flavanone to enhance the flavor of dishes.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tasted the flavanone-infused candies.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of teas included a rare flavanone from a distant land.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooking spices filled the kitchen with hints of flavanone.
